posts.post_title: 3 T203 Mayo Cut Plug Baseball Comics FS/T
posts.post_content:
Posted By: James Gallo
I am trying to complete this set so if you have any extras PLMK. These are nice examples that display well especially for the grades.

Right Over the Plate SGC 20 Fair One major crease across card, couple minor corner creases rounded corners. $100

The Bleachers SGC 40 Very Good Slightly soft corners, light stain to top of card, one minor corner crease. $200

The Naps SGC 30 Good Several creases to corners, some heavy wear to lower corners, off center $150

These are tough cards to find. I will consider any cash offers especially if you want all three.

Shipping in $6 priority mail.

Please email me at jgallony@aol.com for scans and questions. 

Thanks

James Gallo

Looking for 1915 Cracker Jacks and 1909-11 American Caramel E90-1.
